title: Single Image Project
description: A project with just one beautiful image.
fullDescription: This project showcases a single, high-resolution image. It's a demonstration of a project with only one image.

title: Image Slideshow Project
description: A project with multiple images in a slideshow.
fullDescription: This project features a slideshow of beautiful images. You can navigate through the images using the left and right arrows.

title: Another Single Image
description: One more project with a single image.
fullDescription: A single stunning photograph of a landscape.
